author: Ai Weiwei
title: Opinion: The virus in the body politic: We have lost our ability to cherish each other - The Globe and Mail
description: In authoritarian China and democracies such as the U.S., the coronavirus pandemic has exposed the infections that societies have left in each other – and the loss of a sense of shared destiny
